Class CMCUtils

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.auth.CMCUtils
public class CMCUtils extends Object
Utility functions for parsing and creating CMC messages.

  • Method Details

    • getCRMFRequestMessageBuilder

      public static org.bouncycastle.cert.crmf.CertificateRequestMessageBuilder getCRMFRequestMessageBuilder(org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmc.BodyPartID requestId, se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.models.cert.CertificateModel certificateModel, se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.attribute.AttributeValueEncoder attributeValueEncoder) throws CMCMessageException
      Create a CRMF request message builder for a CRMF certificate request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the ID of the created request
      certificateModel - model holding data about the certificate to be issued
      attributeValueEncoder - encoder for attribute values
      Returns:
      CRMF request message builder
      Throws:
      CMCMessageException - on error creating the builder

    • getCertificationRequest

      public static org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmc.CertificationRequest getCertificationRequest(se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.models.cert.CertificateModel certificateModel, org.bouncycastle.operator.ContentSigner signer, se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.attribute.AttributeValueEncoder attributeValueEncoder) throws CMCMessageException
      Creates a PKCS10 request
      Parameters:
      certificateModel - data about the certificate to be requested
      signer - the signer of the PKCS10 request
      attributeValueEncoder - attribute value encoder
      Returns:
      PKCS10 request
      Throws:
      CMCMessageException - on errors creating the request

    • signEncapsulatedCMSContent

      public static byte[] signEncapsulatedCMSContent(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1ObjectIdentifier contentType, org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Encodable content, List<X509Certificate> signerCertChain, org.bouncycastle.operator.ContentSigner signer) throws CMCMessageException
      Sign encapsulated CMS content
      Parameters:
      contentType - type of content OID
      content - content
      signerCertChain - certificate chain of the signer with the signer certificate first in the list and trust anchor last
      signer - ContentSigner for signing the data
      Returns:
      the byte of the signed CMS signature with encapsulated signed data
      Throws:
      CMCMessageException - on error executing the request

    • getCMCControlObject

      public static CMCControlObject getCMCControlObject(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1ObjectIdentifier asn1controlOid, org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmc.PKIResponse pkiResponse) throws CMCMessageException
      Obtain a CMC Control object from a PKI response object
      Parameters:
      asn1controlOid - the OID of the target CMC Control
      pkiResponse - PKI response object holding CMC Control objects
      Returns:
      CMCControlObject
      Throws:
      CMCMessageException - error parsing the PKI response

    • getCMCControlObject

      public static CMCControlObject getCMCControlObject(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1ObjectIdentifier asn1controlOid, org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmc.PKIData pkiData) throws CMCMessageException
      Obtain a CMC Control object from a PKI data object (request)
      Parameters:
      asn1controlOid - the OID of the target CMC Control
      pkiData - PKI data object holding CMC Control objects
      Returns:
      CMCControlObject
      Throws:
      CMCMessageException - error parsing the PKI data

    • getSigningTime

      public static Date getSigningTime(byte[] cmsContentInfo) throws CMCMessageException
      Get the value of the signed signingTime attribute from a CMS signed CMC message
      Parameters:
      cmsContentInfo - CMS content info bytes
      Returns:
      signing time attribute value if present, or null
      Throws:
      CMCMessageException - error parsing CMS data

      Returns:
